title: Tannhauser RH-44

Damage: 5D+2 '''Capsule''': Another offering from Tannhauser Shipyards, the RH-44 is an easily customizable starfighter utilized greatly in the mid and outer rim territories. Dubbed "The Lean Machine" because of its low resale value, many pilots who are down on their luck or short on credits can usually get one for under 15,000; due to the resilient nature of the craft, they find that the price is quite a bargain.
